items.abstract:
<jats:title>Abstract</jats:title>
            <jats:p>Answering a question of A. Kanamori, we prove that there is no Jónsson filter over the least Jónsson cardinal. We also notice that, assuming □<jats:sub>κ</jats:sub>, the successor κ<jats:sup>+</jats:sup> cannot be Jónsson.</jats:p>
title:
No Jónsson filters over ℵ
                  ω
Pneumonia and Continuous Enteral Feeding
